## files.Api.getMany() method

Returns a page of files from the given Matter and Folder.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getMany(request: GetMatterFilesRequest): Promise<GetMatterFilesResponse>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  request | [GetMatterFilesRequest](./smokeball-client-sdk.files.getmatterfilesrequest.md) |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[GetMatterFilesResponse](./smokeball-client-sdk.files.getmatterfilesresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Example


```
const request: GetMatterFilesRequest = {
 matterId: '410f2b2b-7adf-436e-a5fd-dab1733d3fba',
 // The folder id can be left empty and will default to the root directory.
 folderId: '410f2b2b-7adf-436e-a5fd-dab1733d3fbb',
 limit: 10,
 offset: 0
}
const files = sdk.files.getMany(request);
```
